HomePage.title: Welcome!
HomePage.intro1: Nexus Tools is a set of tools at your disposal to organize your activity in the Verse.
HomePage.intro2: The toolbox is under development and some features are reserved for a group of brave testers. If you want to join the adventure, contact the Nexus Corporation! In any case, your feedback on public features is welcome!

features.title: Get Organized!
features.subtitle: Tools to make community life easier.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Sell your items and services to other explorers of the Verse or find what you need!

crafting.title: Crafting
crafting.description: Manage your recipes within your organization and rent your skills to interested buyers.

reputation.title: Reputation
reputation.description: Centralize the reputations of your guild members to facilitate your outings and mission sharing.

developers.title: Modular
developers.description: Integrate our tools directly into your applications via our open API.

Footer.copyright: © 2025 Nexus Corporation. All rights reserved. Images and assets from Star Citizen owned by Cloud Imperium Games.

Crafting.title: Crafting
Crafting.wip: We are working on creating this page, and we are waiting for new information on crafting in the Verse to complete this feature.

ShoppingNewItem.title: Sell

noShop.error: You are not a member of any shop and therefore cannot sell items on this platform.
noShop.explanation: We limit access to sellers to ensure the quality of service. Our system engineers are working hard to open the platform to all sellers in the Verse!
noShop.contact: Contact Nexus Corporation to obtain a sales license.

ShoppingNewItem.itemDescriptionHelper: Describe the product or service in a few lines. Be concise to maximize the impact of your ad!
ShoppingNewItem.itemPrice: Sale price (aUEC) (or minimum price for a service)
ShoppingNewItem.addArticle: Add the item to the shop

NewOrganization.title: New organization
NewOrganization.error: For now, organizations can only be created with beta access assigned by Nexus Corporation. Contact us to create your account!
